import React from 'react' import { FaCog, FaHome, FaPoll, FaRegEnvelope, FaRegFileAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; export const Sidebar = ({sidebarToggle}) => { return (

Admin Dashboard

  • Home
  • Hazard & Risk Management
  • Health & Safety Audit
  • Incidents Management
  • Inspections
) }
